title: Why does the nexus exploding erase chat?
body: This fucking annoys me so much I'm always in the middle of typing some massive sentence then it's just like *poof* it's gone try retyping it in the 2 or so seconds you have left.

replies.body:
Type faster. You have been playing the game long enough to know how much time you have.

You can always save your longwinded comments for the post game chat.
This was part of the code since a long time ago and it would be extremely hard for them to change without effecting the rest of the game. That's the official reason.

do you code? because my housemate does. i feel augmenting code is day to day business for riot. they may just not know that it is an issue. you may remember the rift update, i mean if they were going to fix it. they would have done it then. it annoys me too.
